dt: {bc}any of various bony fishes (family Polynemidae, especially genus {it}Polydactylus{/it}) having elongated filamentous rays on the pectoral fin
{bc}a fish (such as {it}Dorosoma pretense{/it} of the herring family) having usually one similar ray extending from a fin

shortdef: any of various bony fishes (family Polynemidae, especially genus Polydactylus) having elongated filamentous rays on the pectoral fin; also : a fish (such as Dorosoma pretense of the herring family) having usually one similar ray extending from a fin
